code: import React from'react';import{MoonSunSwitch}from'@app/components/common/MoonSunSwitch/MoonSunSwitch';import{useAppDispatch,useAppSelector}from'@app/hooks/reduxHooks';import{setTheme}from'@app/store/slices/themeSlice';import{setNightMode}from'@app/store/slices/nightModeSlice';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";export var ThemePicker=function ThemePicker(){var dispatch=useAppDispatch();var theme=useAppSelector(function(state){return state.theme.theme;});var handleClickButton=function handleClickButton(theme){dispatch(setTheme(theme));dispatch(setNightMode(false));};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MoonSunSwitch,{isMoonActive:theme==='dark',onClickMoon:function onClickMoon(){return handleClickButton('dark');},onClickSun:function onClickSun(){return handleClickButton('light');}});};
